post.body: Sounds cool to me!!
REDWINE
You thinking about taking white or red? I think sparkling wine is always a good buy
What a great deal-what 's the wine?
Make sure you stop by Taylor's Refresher for those garlic fries
Word!! I wish I had a tv!!
its in Springfield NJ
I read about this-what ashame
where you going to be at?
Sure where at??
I have been here and it's pretty fun!
What wines are you thinking about?
a bottle of Red Burgundy would be most excellent
Do you know what they are?
Awesome!!
No Worries!!
How can I sit down with Tavis?
Awesome!!
That is one of my favorite Pinots!!
Pinot Noir can do that to you!!
good piece!!
well that great i'm black and i make wine-where should I send samples?
Awesome!! we should hook up for a drink in the new year
Awesome!! we hook up for a drink in the new year
LOL !! no belongings
Thanks man
NICE-great pairing!! wine & Darrin Baker AKA "Doughboy"
is heading to the Wine Library!
please join Mouton Noir Wines on Facebook http://is.gd/bup9
loves Saturday mornings
Okay the cookies are out for sampling...
is attending the Gotham Writers Xmas party-Phoebe is judging a cookie contest with her little helper Finnegan
What's the best place for WebHosting?
is going out to play in the SNOW!
is watching Fat Albert on Hulu with Finnegan-we can't turn it off! i think i'm more excited than he is
new wallpaper for my iPhone! http://twitpic.com/u3k5
is working his ass off!! time for a quick nap...
thinks this is such a cool concept that I bought a spot!!!http://is.gd/cdns
its 6am and i'm ready to get this day started-time to finish Mouton Noir Holiday Postcards
just finished dinner at Vespa and now I' m winding down for the night
how can my local Deli let their Liquor License EXPIRE-NOT TONIGHT-NOT NOW!!!
okay it official watch out Crooklyn-Mouton is coming!
is going to watch some football
is meeting with graphic designer for Mouton Noir Wines holiday postcards!
is back from the Farmers Market and ready to make Finn's 1st taste of real food
its 4:30am & I'm crashing
is with out phone!! iphone finally gave out
is all about popcorn & a movie tonight
is unpacking boxes and hi on life!!
is watching HUGE snowflakes fall from the sky
is no sleep til Brooklyn!!
is impressed movers are moving fast-about an hour more to go b4 being all packed in the truck
is all packed and just greeted the movers who are 10min late
is still packing...
is grabbing a couple of slices from Koronet http://twitpic.com/xq8q
is last minute packing!!
is all about Nutella & Animal Crackers!!!
